Full-text available
  • Dec 2014
  • Yongying Ruan
  • Alexander Konstantinov
  • Si-Qin Ge
  • Xing-Ke Yang
Chinese species of Chaetocnema semicoerulea group are revised and three new species described as new: C. salixis sp. n., C. yulongensis sp. n. and C. deqinensis sp. n..
